SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GameView
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLIView, GUI
public abstract class GameView extends javafx.application.Application
This is the interface used for the view (CLI or GUI). It provides methods for interacting with the game and handling player actions.
